website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses competing golf shoes in nearly every category: aesthetics, build quality, and performance. Worth the investment for your golf game.
pros: These shoes have style plus top-of-the-line features: performance-enhancing spike system, supple leather craftsmanship, soft interior cushioning, moisture-resistance
cons: Expensive, but if you are as serious about your golf shoes as you are your swing, these shoes offer exceptional quality for the  money

customer_reviews.title: Another Quality Golf Shoe from ECCO
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple pairs of ECCO golf shoes; these appear to run slightly shorter than the others I have - a bit disappointing. Fits otherwise like a sneaker, very soft and comfy, little to no break-in time, I'm guessing. I like the "rhinestone" detail - wondering how they will hold up with use, but looks nice. Innersoles have a kind of weird-looking black stained pink (unless I got a pair that somebody already sweated in?!?). A quality, soft leather golf shoe, pricey as they are!
customer_reviews.author: Gisell375

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like these shoes because of the styling and brand
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these shoes because of the styling and brand. I have a pair of Ecco for about 10 years. I'm usually a Euro 39, but a tad small (tried on in store). Ordered the 40. It's slightly large but better than 39. So why did I return them?...this pair caused my ankles/feet to roll outward. I tried adjusting insert, but no difference. For this price, I expect just right!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable golf shoes I've ever worn. I have them in three different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!! The best golf shoes ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, these are the best golf shoes I've ever had!!! I was nervous to buy shoes online without trying them on and they were way more expensive than the other golf shoes I was looking at. But they were worth every single penny spent!! It's like walking on clouds. I selected that they fit as expected but my feet are narrow and these fit like a glove. Definitely recommend these golf shoes. You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Garrigan

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe. Made to short in front
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe. Made to short in front. Run small I am a size 8.5/9m. Bought a size 9/9.5 didn't fit right . I have other shoes by Ecco & they fit & feel great but this particular shoe didn't fit although the quality is there.
customer_reviews.author: pattyl

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad to finally see some nicer color offerings., but....In previous versions of this shoe, this size worked fine. But the 2016 model runs a bit shorter. If on the edge, go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Just a bit tight but after 1-2 rounds they fit perfect. Very comfortable. Have another pair in black as well. Will never go back to other golf shoes after wearing these! Support, comfort and style all in one shoe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Nuttall

customer_reviews.title: Great show BUT will be sending them back as can't wear with orthotics😕
customer_reviews.text: Too "shallow" meaning wearing with orthotics not possible. I loved everything else about them, look, soft feel of leather, construction of, etc. regret having to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Bohaker

customer_reviews.title: Love these  !!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge Ecco fan. These are y far my favorite pair I own. Great support. Great lines and the color and the spikes... all awesome
customer_reviews.author: sally mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Love these golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these golf shoes! Finally I can get a size 5.5 and they fit great. They are expensive but if my feet are happy then I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Jean E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best golf shoes ever. didn't need to break them in. very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ulhwa jenkins

customer_reviews.title: but they are the best looking golf shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: I haven't played golf in the shoes yet, but they are the best looking golf shoes I own. Fast delivery, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Merolina

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love these golf shoes! They always fit perfect, never need "breaking in" to fit the shape of my foot, and they wear like no others I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Moser

customer_reviews.title: In Love with these Golf Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! The leather is beautiful. Fits perfectly- feels like walking on a cloud! The white is the best looking of the bunch! (I have the blue, too)
customer_reviews.author: BK CT

customer_reviews.title: Was a little disappointed. Didn't fit well
customer_reviews.text: Was a little disappointed. Didn't fit well. Gave me a blister on my heel after one use. Had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoes and fit
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoes and fit. I have narrow feet and a high arch and these shoes fit my foot great, I own two pair of the regular tennis shoes in this style. Best shoes I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Katmayo

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, the design and they are very comfortable. They clean up well after a round of golf too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing the tool for the spikes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great, but I'm missing the slim-lok took to change the spikes. If I'm sent the tool, I will be happy to change my rating
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very soft. No breakin required. Have been working ...
customer_reviews.text: Very soft. No breakin required. Have been working well as far as fit goes.
customer_reviews.author: Long time Prime customer

customer_reviews.title: Best fit ever
customer_reviews.text: Best fit ever. Never able to put on any shoe before that I had to break in first until now. Yay😄
customer_reviews.author: Janet Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. Wore them today and they were so comfortable. Shoes are so stylish also !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, Comfortable and Supportive
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I have several pair in various colors. Fit is terrific, sturdy but very comfortable. I have terrible feet and these are a wonderful option for people like me who walk 18 holes. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Tina S

customer_reviews.title: ... a lot of golf and these are the MOST comfortable. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I play a lot of golf and these are the MOST comfortable. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: andrea yaeger

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoes I have ever worn, right out of the box. I normally wear a 6.5 wide. These do not come in wide, so I ordered a 37 and a 38 to try. The reviews were spot on. The 37's fit in length, but were not wide enough. The 38's were a bit longer with all the room I needed in the foot bed in the width. It turns out that I like more length in a golf shoe so I kept the 38's. . I wore them for the first time all day and complimented them all day to everyone :) I will definitely order another pair in a different color to have choices.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Soft feel
customer_reviews.text: The shoes feel great. They are really soft. The heel almost seems to slip a bit and I may need to adjust that. After they are worn on the golf course, I will update my post.
customer_reviews.author: lyricmd

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the shoe didnt come in an original box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ECCO Women's Biom G2 Golf Shoe
product_meta.description:
Ladies golf is becoming hugely popular, and the professionals are as demanding as their male counterparts when it comes to premium quality footwear. Fortunately, this excellent shoe delivers both good looks and great functionality, remarkably light weight this biom anatomically shaped lasts cushion the foot for optimum stability, while the soft yak leather wraps your foot in complete comfort.

ECCO is a European shoe company founded in Denmark in 1963. Today they own and operate factories throughout Europe and Asia. They produce all the leather used in making Ecco shoes, taking measures to protect the environment at the same time. Their sole aim is to make a comfortable walking shoe.
feature_bullets: Weather resistance - naturally soft, breathable and strong yak leather uppers are treated with hydromax
Anatomical last shape - developed by scanning the feet of 2,500 athletes to provide ideal levels of support
Technical insole system - a new, ultra-premium insole with silicon printing helps prevent unwanted foot movement during the swing
